name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Web Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **TypeScript**, API integration, and web infrastructure. Proven track record in enhancing developer experience through effective documentation and collaboration. Highly skilled in building scalable applications across healthcare and financial industries using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Proficient in utilizing **gRPC** for efficient communication and managing dependencies with modern build tooling techniques. 
Experienced in delivering high-performance systems that incorporate AI/ML technologies, enabling predictive analytics and automation. Demonstrated ability to deploy cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines effectively. Familiar with compliance frameworks including HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring robust security and adherence to industry standards.
